title: PSU banks' compensation against fraud rises over three-fold to Rs 140 crore in FY'24
description: Union Bank of India paid the highest compensation of Rs 74.96 crore followed by Bank of India at Rs 20.38 crore and Indian Bank at Rs 16.16 crore during FY24, FM Nirmala Sitharaman said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
